questions.question: Which handshape represents the letter 'A' in ASL?
options: Make a fist with thumb resting against the side of your index finger
Point your index finger up, curl other fingers to touch thumb
Extend only your pinky finger, fold other fingers down
Hold your hand up with fingers straight and together
questions.explanation: The letter A is formed by making a fist with the thumb resting against the side of the index finger.

questions.question: How do you sign the number '7' in ASL?
options: Touch thumb to pinky, keep other three fingers up
Touch thumb to ring finger, keep other three fingers up
Touch thumb to middle finger, keep other three fingers up
Touch thumb to index finger, keep other three fingers up
questions.explanation: The number 7 is signed by touching the thumb to the ring finger while keeping the other three fingers extended.

questions.question: What is the correct way to sign 'Thank You'?
options: Wave your hand with an open palm
Touch fingertips to chin, then move hand forward and down
Place flat hand on chest and move in circular motion
Clap hands together twice
questions.explanation: Thank you is signed by touching fingertips to the chin, then moving the hand forward and down.

questions.question: Which letter is formed by extending index and middle fingers horizontally?
options: Letter G
Letter H
Letter K
Letter U
questions.explanation: The letter H is formed by extending the index and middle fingers horizontally while keeping the other fingers folded.

questions.question: How do you sign the number '0' in ASL?
options: Make a fist with thumb over fingers
Form an O shape with all fingers and thumb
Point index finger up, fold other fingers down
Spread all five fingers wide open
questions.explanation: The number 0 is signed by forming an O shape with all fingers and thumb, similar to the letter O.

questions.question: What is the sign for 'Water'?
options: Bring fingertips to mouth as if eating
Make W handshape and tap it against your chin twice
Touch fingertips to mouth, then move to side of face
Make fist and rub it in circular motion on chest
questions.explanation: Water is signed by making a W handshape and tapping it against the chin twice.

questions.question: Which handshape represents the letter 'Y'?
options: Point index and middle fingers up in a V shape
Extend thumb and pinky, fold other fingers down
Point index, middle, and ring fingers up together
Cross index finger over middle finger, both pointing up
questions.explanation: The letter Y is formed by extending the thumb and pinky while folding the other fingers down.

questions.question: How do you sign 'Please' in ASL?
options: Touch fingertips to chin, then move hand forward and down
Place flat hand on chest and move in circular motion
Wave your hand with an open palm
Make fist and nod it up and down
questions.explanation: Please is signed by placing a flat hand on the chest and moving it in a circular motion.

questions.question: What number is represented by pointing four fingers up with thumb folded across palm?
options: Number 3
Number 4
Number 5
Number 6
questions.explanation: The number 4 is signed by pointing four fingers up while folding the thumb across the palm.

questions.question: How do you sign 'Help'?
options: Hook index fingers together, then switch positions
Place one fist on opposite palm and lift both hands up
Make fists and tap one on top of the other repeatedly
Snap index and middle finger down to thumb
questions.explanation: Help is signed by placing one fist on the opposite palm and lifting both hands up together.
